author: rony
msg: 20060912 00:45 Edited the Rexx scripts to point to ooRexx home and home of BSF4Rexx.

author: pdodds
msg: Extended the projectDeploy goal to provide a deferExceptions settings which if set to true allows you to use the same semantics as the deploy/install directories.

author: pdodds
msg: Standardized the return of exceptions from the AdminCommandsService, also extended the ANT tasks to provide a deferExceptions settings which if set to true allows you to use the same semantics as the deploy/install directories.

author: rony
msg: 20060912 00:33 Removed 'samples/jsp', 'samples/jsplike', 'samples/multiplication_test' as they need the Windows OLE/ActiveX scripting, which is not supported on BSF 2.* anymore.

author: craigmcc
msg: Abstract the post-advance navigation inside the advance() method,
analogous to the way it works in the start() method.  Also, tighten up
contracts on throwing ISE from advance(), start(), and stop().
